channel.title: Data Preprocessing on Phravin Xaviour
channel.description: Recent content in Data Preprocessing on Phravin Xaviour

item.title: Geothermal Temperature Prediction - Regression Models
item.description:
Description

• Developed and deployed advanced machine learning algorithms to predict subsurface temperatures for geothermal energy achieving top ranked models based on Mean Absolute Error.

• Demonstrated expertise in data preprocessing, hyperparameter tuning, and model evaluation to enhance best predictions.

item.title: Wine Astringency Values Prediction
item.description:
Description

• Created a multiple linear regression model by changing dependent and independent variables to accurately predict the astringency values of tannin level measured by two different methods.

• Identified relationship between associated variables using hypothesis tests and correlation matrix.
